title: Peer-to-Peer Boliviano (BOB) Exchange Data
subtitle: Github Actions ETL Pipeline
description:
This project contains the ETL pipeline for the Peer-to-Peer Boliviano (BOB) Exchange Data. The data is collected from various sources and transformed into a clean format for analysis. 
The pipeline includes data extraction, transformation, and loading processes, along with data quality checks.

resources.description: Advertiser data from the BOB exchange

fields.name: advertiser_monthordercount
fields.description: Number of orders placed by the advertiser in the last month

fields.name: advertiser_monthfinishrate
fields.description: Finish rate of the advertiser in the last month

fields.name: advertiser_usertype
fields.description: Type of the advertiser (e.g., user, merchant)

fields.name: advertiser_u seridentity
fields.description: Identity of the advertiser (e.g., MASS_MERCHANT, BLOCK_MERCHANT)

fields.name: advertiser_isblocked
fields.description: Indicates if the advertiser is blocked

fields.name: advertiser_activetimeinsecond
fields.description: Active time of the advertiser in seconds

resources.name: advertiser
resources.title: Advertiser Table

name: p2p-bob-exchange
